name: Eclipse: Echo of Dimension
description:
"Eclipse: Echo of Dimension" is a walking simulator and adventure experience game.

Immerse and wondering in an illusional ethereal dream of alien civilization ruins. With further exploration of the dimension, different fragments of poets will be discovered.

In the relative time and space, exploring the philosophy of existence and dimensions. In the interstellar realm of shadows, discovering and listening to fragments of poetry from another dimension, searching for clues to the lost remnants of an extraterrestrial civilization.
